Text: Fwd Enron Counter Partybit ReturnPath Received from rlyydmxaolcom rlyydmailaolcom by airydmailaolcom vr with ESMTP Mon Oct Received from mailsiscomnet mailsiscomnet by rlyydmxaolcom vb with ESMTP Mon Oct Received qmail invoked from network Oct Received from ppppmcolohsiscomnet HELO SALES by mailsiscomnet with SMTP Oct ReplyTo From Dan Ryan To Jeffery Lowney Subject Enron Counter Party Date Mon Oct MessageID MIMEVersion ContentType textplain charsetiso XPriority Normal XMSMailPriority Normal XMailer Microsoft Outlook IMO Build XMimeole Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V Importance Normal Jeff When Jason Peters and I concluded negotiations of the Enron Provider Agreement and the General Terms and Conditions GTC we had sent him the Release of the new Counter Party Management System we coded and went live on the site with to meet Enrons requirements He took several days in having his people check it out operationally and he approved it We were prepared with the following language to include at the end of Section of the GTC but was not asked for it so he never saw it You can use the following at the end of Section if Enron wants but the System is operational and in place as they requested EnergyGateway will implement and maintain systems which allow User to determine whether other users of the System are approved counter parties for User to trade with User may modify its list of approved counter parties at anytime Good luck in finalizing the GTC with Enron Please call me if I can help in any way Thanks Dan Dan Ryan President EnergyGatewaycom x Office Fax Cell

RE AgreementsEnclosed is the redlined version of our General Terms as well as the final Agreement Jason Peters agreed to As the earlier email states we developed our Counterparty Management program to satisfy concerns ENA voiced regarding credit and customization of future customers of Enron North America After reviewing the attached documents you should find everything in order for ENA to execute and return the General Terms Agreements I am available at your earliest convenience to discuss any questions regarding the afore mentioned Thank you for your time in reviewing these documents Sincerely Jeffery C Lowney Vice President EnergyGatewaycom enronzip
